system_filters.name: Default
system_filters.description: The site's default filter. Hides everything that is not safe, and spoiler fandoms related stuff. Also, must serve to hide all low quality memes.

system_filters.name: Everything
system_filters.description: This filter won't filter out anything at all. Be warned, you will see even the most grotesque images that was upload. I advice use only as base for your own filters. Staffs MUST use this for moderation issues.

forums.name: General Discussion
forums.description: This is a discussion forum for everything unrelated to the differents topics talked in the other forums.

forums.name: Shows and Movies
forums.description: Discuss TV shows and movies, as well as their characters and theories.

forums.name: Otaku Haven
forums.description: Discuss everything about anime, manga, or the fandom in general in the heaven for the otaku.

forums.name: Furry Reality
forums.description: Discuss everything about furries, fursuits or everything about the fandom in your personal reality.

forums.name: Gamers Metaverse
forums.description: Do you like to play videogames with other people, or want to talk of the last games? Here is your metaverse

forums.name: Site and Policy
forums.description: For site discussion and policy discussion.

forums.name: Art Chat
forums.description: Discuss art of any form, and share techniques and tips. The major fandoms have their own post for art inside.

forums.name: Roleplaying
forums.description: Roleplaying forum, in which people play roles.

forums.name: Roleplaying After Dark
forums.description: Adult roleplaying forum, in which people play +18 roles.

forums.name: Site Assistant Discussion
forums.description: Forum for Staff and their Assistants. Everything MUST be on-topic.
